MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD14 postcode area of Eyemouth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:15am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and complex repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:55am on 25th April
